item.title: Windows | Disable Updates
item.description: Brief Windows Update BLocker(Wub) - A minimal tool to block windows updates. Download You can download the latest version from the official website Extract the zip file and open the Wub_x64.exe file as adminstator Here click the second option (Disable updates) Once you have disabled the updates the app will look like this You can close the app now. If you check for updates now in windows settings you will see this error
